r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $10.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with M Sullivan Son. The average
  contract duration was 2.88 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.6M. The longest
  contract was 7.15 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $14.7M.
lookup_name: 'M SULLIVAN SON'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '10.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '33%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '29%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.0M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.88'
s421_mean_contract_value: '5.6M'
s425_max_duration: '7.15'
s422_max_contract_value: '14.7M'
---
